decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2387-0, Unnumbered Block Plan, 2403 Revision 0, 2402 Revision 0, Unnumbered Flood Risk Assessment, Unnumbered location plan, received 22/10/2013, 2406 Revision 1, 2404 Revision 1, 2405 Revision 1, received 10/01/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The door formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and side canopy
